title: SOFA score calculation
text: Asuming data loaded dataframe df, SOFA score can calculated two different ways.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Use sofa_magic_wrapper() function use raw data file Acutelines database. SOFA related variables coded SOFA_[timespan]h_[variable]. Make sure variables present. interval can used set time stap interval correspondance dataset, timespan can use set maximum timespan. default return_df FALSE can left , set TRUE function return inidivual elements SOFA scora instead totals. dataset different naming schema (SOFA_[timespan]h_[variable] format), can still calculate SOFA score package, however, provide package mapping column dataset corresponding acutal element SOFA score. First define mapping: pass mapping sofa_total function along dataframe:
code: result <- sofa_magic_wrapper(df, interval=24, timespan=72) column_mapping <- c(   PaO2 = "your_PaO2_variable",   SpO2 = "your_SpO2_variable",   FiO2 = "your_FiO2_variable",   oxygen_supply = "your_oxygen_supply_variable",   oxygen_mode = "your_oxygen_mode_variable",   platelets = "your_platelets_variable",   bilirubin = "your_bilirubin_variable",   MAP = "your_MAP_variable",   dopamine = "your_dopamine_variable",   dobutamine = "your_dobutamine_variable",   epinephrine = "your_epinephrine_variable",   norepinephrine = "your_norepineprhine_variable",   norepinephrine_amp = "your_norepinephrine_amp_variable",   GCS = "your_GCS_variable",   creatinine = "your_creatinine_variable" ) result <- sofa_total(df, column_mapping)

title: SOFA score calculation
text: SOFA (Sequential Organ Failure Assessment) [1,2] calculation functions designed provide worst SOFA score patient within specific interval. retrospectively calculating SOFA score, one must address missing values inaccurately recorded values. function automatically handles issues. Consequently, SOFA score functions incorporate several assumptions ensure feasible calculations. Users aware assumptions utilizing functions.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Many respiratory parameters tend missing. sofa_respiration() function calculated respiratory points SOFA score following rules assumptions:

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Venous PaO2: PaO2 7 kPa, assumed venous removed dataset. next available value used possible; otherwise, marked missing. Low SpO2: SpO2 50%, value removed dataset treated missing 1. Note: Pulse oximeters calibrated SpO2 values 70-100%. Values 70% considered qualitatively rather quantitatively accurate therefore set 70%. [3] Approximation using SpO2: PaO2 unknown (e.g., arterial blood gas available), imputed SpO2 using Brown’s equation [4]. Rounded one decimal place. Imputation unreliable SpO2 >96% due hemoglobin-oxygen dissociation curve plateau. Therefore, PaO2 110 mmHg used substitute SpO2 ≥97% avoid overestimation. [5] Missing Values: PaO2 SpO2 unavailable, value treated missing. Consequently, points assigned domain.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Values 100: FiO2 ≥101, capped 100 values physiologically possible. issue originates certain devices calculation FiO2 automated algorithm using specific parameters. situations, algorithms may erroneously report values greater 100, technically impossible. address , values adjusted maximum 100. FiO2 zero value: FiO2 = 0, treated missing.2 High FiO2 respiratory data: FiO2 ≥85 oxygen delivery device known (Oxygen flow zero missing), likely SpO2 confusion data entry. value treated missing.3 Fractional FiO2 Values: FiO2 1, assumed fraction multiplied 100 convert percentage. Low FiO2 Values: FiO2 1 21, treated missing.4 FiO2 missing oxygen supplementation type flow rate available, FiO2 estimated using table . oxygen mode available, maximum FiO2 mode used. Estimating FiO2 oxygen flow/delivery rates:

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Calculates coagulation SOFA-score part based platelet count (*103 µL-1) using sofa_coagulation() function. section correct unrealistic platelet counts, data generally already curated lab.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Calculates SOFA score component cardiovascular system using sofa_cardiovascular() function. first two levels (0 1 points) based Mean Arterial Pressure (MAP), higher levels determined catecholamine administration. dopamine, dobutamine, epinephrine, norepinephrine, dosages need provied µg/kg/min. cases, norepinephrine administered bolus rather continuous infusion. recorded norepinephrine_amp variable, set 1 (true) bolus administration 0 (false) otherwise. Since amount norepinephrine administered differentiates 3 4 points cardiovascular SOFA score, script automatically assign correct point value. Therefore, norepinephrine given, 3.5 points assigned. Researchers decide whether round value based specific research question.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Calculates SOFA score component liver using sofa_liver() function. Points assigned according following table. Bilirubin levels entered μmol/L, mg/dL reference.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Calculates SOFA score component central nervous system using sofa_cns() function. Points assigned based Glascow Coma Scale (GCS). GCS score < 3 reflects severe neurological dysfunction assigned maximum score, eg patient tube.

title: SOFA score calculation
text: Calculates SOFA score compontent renal function using sofa_renal() function. Points assigned based creatinine level (µmol/L). section correct unrealistic creatinine levels, data generally already curated lab. following table lists assigned points: [6] Creatine provided µmol/L, mg/dL reference. following assumptions made calculating renal SOFA score: Urine output < 500 mL/day correlates moderate renal dysfunction, < 200 mL/day indicates severe dysfunction. Urine output currently implemented calculation, data often missing registred inadequately.

title: Toolbox to work with Acutelines biobank data.
text: package can used work data extracted Acutelines data- biobank. provides tools parse data extracts perform calculations uniform matter. Acutelines multi-disciplinary prospective hospital-based cohort study examining 24/7 complete acute patient journey admitted ED University Medical Centre Groningen (UMCG), tertiary care teaching hospital Netherlands. employs broad range investigative procedures assessing pre-hospital, -hospital, long-term health factors affect outcome patients acute conditions. cohort population broadly representative people living Northern Netherlands acute medical conditions. Detailed information cohort participant selection can found elsewhere [1] [2]. Participants asked written informed consent, applicable proxy. Acutelines cohort study approved medical ethics committee UMCG, Netherlands registered trial registration number NCT04615065 ClinicalTrials.gov [3]. www.acutelines.nl ter Avest E, van Munster BC, van Wijk RJ, et al Cohort profile Acutelines: large data/biobank acute emergency medicine. BMJ Open 2021;11:e047349. doi: 10.1136/bmjopen-2020-047349 https://clinicaltrials.gov/study/NCT04615065

title: Toolbox to work with Acutelines biobank data.
text: installation, can process data depending data extract. Refer Articles section documentation general introduction. Start importing dataset CSV, example: run desired functions Acutelines Datatoolbox, eg: sofa_magic_wrapper().
code: df <- read.csv("path/to/data/file.csv",                header = TRUE, # Import CSV header (first line) as column names                sep = ";", # Set CSV columns separator                dec = ".", # Set CSV decimal separator for numbers                fileEncoding = "UTF-8-BOM", # Set file encoding format, change or ommit according to file type                na.strings=c("NA","NaN", " ", "\\N", "NULL")) # Set which values are considered NA

title: acutelines.datatoolbox 1.0.1
text: Added DOI CITATION.cff file make citing package possible.

title: acutelines.datatoolbox 1.0.0
text: Added dplyr dependency make use dplyr::case_when(), clear cluttered ifelse structures. Fixed missing mechanical ventilation check calculation respiratory part SOFA-score. mechanical ventilation, respiratory SOFA-score now limited 2 points. FiO2 <1 consider fraction instead percentage. convert fraction percentage (corrected FiO2 = old FiO2 * 100). FiO2 >1 <21 consider missing. FiO2 >100 measurement error devices, set 100. Revised oxygen supply FiO2 conversion based device delivering oxygen combination flow. SpO2 >= 97% now treated 96% result PaO2 14.7 kPa (110 mmHg). SpO2 50% values discarded, reliable. Convert SpO2 50-70% 70% SpO2 devices reliable range. Fixed minor bugs resolve edge cases using magic wrapper.

title: acutelines.datatoolbox 0.0.0.5
text: Initial public release, includes SOFA score calculation.
